titles.title: Modern School Threat Reporting Act of 2018

To authorize the Attorney General to make grants to States to acquire a mobile application that facilitates the reporting of school safety threats to local law enforcement agencies for use by students in secondary schools, and for other purposes.
Modern School Threat Reporting Act of 2018

bill.summary:
Modern School Threat Reporting Act of 2018
This bill authorizes the Department of Justice to make grants for states to acquire a mobile application that enables students to anonymously report school safety threats to law enforcement agencies.
